abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews performance by composer and violinist Daniel Bernard Roumain at Brooklyn Academy of Music.
snippet: Daniel Bernard Roumain’s “Symphony for the Dance Floor” at the Harvey Theater is the third work in a trilogy by the composer.
lead_paragraph: Daniel Bernard Roumain’s “Symphony for the Dance Floor” at the Harvey Theater is the third work in a trilogy by the composer.

headline.main: A Mash-Up of Methods to Celebrate Life
headline.print_headline: A Mash-Up of Methods to Celebrate Life
headline.seo: Daniel Bernard Roumain at Harvey Theater - Review
